title: [feature request]Support AVX512F intrinstics to vectorize operations
body_html: Pytorch has written SSE, AVX and AVX2 intrinstics to vectorize operations on CPU. Now AVX-512 instruction sets are more and more widely introduced to Intel CPUs. It is necessary to add AVX-512F intrinstics to get better performance.
body_text: Pytorch has written SSE, AVX and AVX2 intrinstics to vectorize operations on CPU.  Now  AVX-512 instruction sets are more and more widely introduced to Intel CPUs.  It is necessary to add AVX-512F intrinstics  to get better performance.
body: Pytorch has written SSE, AVX and AVX2 [intrinstics](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/master/aten/src/TH/vector) to vectorize operations on CPU.  Now  AVX-512 instruction sets are more and more widely introduced to Intel CPUs.  It is necessary to add AVX-512F intrinstics  to get better performance.
